title: Tennis World No. 1 Carlos Alcaraz Says Winning Australian Open Is His Main Goal for 2026 | 10 News
description: Carlos Alcaraz has declared that winning the Australian Open is his main goal in 2026. The 22-year-old is eager to claim the one major title that’s eluded him so far and become the youngest man ever to win a career Grand Slam. title: Flash Flood Victims Latest, ChatGPT Murder-Suicide Lawsuit, DNA Testing For Cancer Risk | 10 News+
description: Victims of the flash flood emergency along the Great Ocean Road in Victoria have described the terrifying moment cars were swept away into the sea.  Concerns around the use and misuse of AI have been thrust into the spotlight following a lawsuit that claims that the popular chatbot ChatGPT encouraged a mentally ill man to kill his mother and himself.  If you could do a free DNA test that revealed whether or not you were likely to develop cancer – would you take it? A new Australian study could be key in the next step in saving lives. title: Four Housemates Narrowly Escape Gold Coast House Fire | 10 News
description: Four housemates narrowly escaped with their lives after their home burst into flames on the Gold Coast this morning. An early riser was their saving grace, spotting the blaze and saving them minutes before the structure collapsed.

description: Donald Trump has finally got his wish - receiving the Nobel Peace Prize from last year's winner - Maria Machado. title: Privacy And Safety Fears As New ‘ChatGPT Health’ App Promises AI-Powered Medical Advice | 10 News
description: Chat GPT can be useful when you need a recipe, or a workout routine but what about when you need a doctor?   Medical professionals are concerned about the upcoming launch of “ChatGPT Health.”  which uses artificial intelligence to securely access medical records and dish out what it deems to be appropriate advice. title: Machado Says Venezuela Can Achieve Orderly Transition To Elections Despite Challenges | 10 News
description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado says she remains confident the remnants of a “criminal regime” will ultimately collapse, allowing an orderly transition to free elections.  Speaking in Washington after meeting President Donald Trump - and gifting him her Nobel Peace Prize - Machado pushed for the opposition to have a role in shaping Venezuela’s future.  Trump has instead backed interim leader Delcy Rodríguez, prioritising stability and access to Venezuela’s oil reserves after Maduro’s removal.  Machado said she intends to return home soon, describing Rodríguez as a “communist” who controls a repressive system but not the military, making her position unstable. title: Heavy Rain And Wind Lash NSW, Flash Flooding Warnings Persist For Central Coast | 10 News
description: Heavy rain and strong winds have pummelled New South Wales, causing flash flooding and leaving homes and cars damaged.   The SES has been inundated with calls for help - and according to the weather bureau - the worst isn't over yet.  As we go to air, there are warnings for potentially life threatening flash flooding hitting communities on the NSW Central Coast. title: New Details In Fatal Minneapolis ICE Shooting Show Renee Good Was Shot Four Times | 10 News
description: New details have emerged about the deadly shooting of US citizen Renee Good who was killed by an immigration agent in Minnesota.  It’s been revealed the mother of three was shot four times.  As our US Correspondent Katherine Firkin explains it comes amid an extraordinary escalation against local authorities by the Trump administration.
